name: flick & chain
description:
This is a fall block style puzzle game.
Flick block and connect four or more blocks of the same color to make them disappear.
You'd better make a chain and aim at a high score.
The blocks go up little by little from the bottom. If a block reaches the ceiling, the game is over.

-Music
Maoudamashii : https://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/
